729497f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Clove Road
729497f-a.text:
()
1860 Richmond Terrace, at the S.W. corner of Clove Road, shoWing the old De Groot House, as viewed eastward across Bodines
Pond.
About 1905.
By Mulford Simonson.
From Staten Island Museum Collection through P.L. Sperr.
(2)
A view of the house from Richmond Terrace, at a later date.
Spring,1924.
P. L. Sperr.

729449f-a.title: Richmond: Richmond Terrace - Clove Road
729449f-a.text:
Richmond Terrace, adjoining the S.E. corner of Clove Road. The house belonged to W.H.J. Bodine in 1874, and to E. Wisely in 1898. The view is east from the corner.

July 5, 1932
P.L. Sperr
